507070089.given_title: Top 20 natural ways for great hair - Times Of India
507070089.resolved_title: Top 20 natural ways for great hair
507070089.excerpt: Spending too much on expensive shampoos, but not getting the desired results that you see in TV ads? It is mostly possible and very common, because we see overly exaggerated results on TV, since these ads are designed to attract customers. But, reality speaks a different story.

514856355.given_title: The Baloney Detection Kit: Carl Sagan’s Rules for Bullshit-Busting and Crit
514856355.resolved_title: The Baloney Detection Kit: Carl Sagan’s Rules for Bullshit-Busting and Critical Thinking
514856355.excerpt: Necessary cognitive fortification against propaganda, pseudoscience, and general falsehood. Carl Sagan was many things — a cosmic sage, voracious reader, hopeless romantic, and brilliant philosopher.

516368724.excerpt: I have been using Airtel 4G in Kolkata [India] for sometime now , and here are few pro’s and con’s I came across . 4G is still in its initial stage of implementation in India and not available through retailers .
